entry.title: Of Legends and (Rugby) Kings
entry.summary:
Author: grlnxtdr29

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 63,657Chapters: 20/35Kudos: 37

Summary: The problem with Legends is that, over time, they are altered, misremembered, or forgotten all together. But some Legends are so great, they must be relived, again and again, until they get it right.Nick dreams only of being the Rugby King of Truham Grammar. Beyond that, he has no idea what he wants to do with his future. Until he meets a boy with curly hair, blue eyes, and dimples.Charlie dreams of Dragons, and Magick, of brave Knights, and a quest set before him, to bring back the olde ways, and set right the Legend that has been retold thousands of times. This time, he vows to set the record straight (Or not so straight.)Who knew their Destinies would collide?

entry.title: Quest For Camelot
entry.summary:
Author: tabbytabbytabby

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 54,868Chapters: 11/13Kudos: 244

Summary: In a land of myth and a time of magic...  Members of the Beacon Hills pack suddenly find themselves thrust back in time with the purpose of helping Merlin stop a threat that is approaching the walls of Camelot. They have no choice but to adapt and try and fit in with this unfamiliar world. Some are more successful than others. It becomes more complicated when they discover the beast that has been terrorizing the kingdom is someone familiar. Especially when they realize that the beast might not be the real threat at all.

entry.title: Sea-Salted Secrets
entry.summary:
Author: Impudent_Miscengenation

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,088Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 49

Summary: An idea that formed from the fact that Merlin was lied to about his heritage. (A heritage that I have tweaked for the sake of this story - a self-indulgent merfolk AU).... .... .... ....Suddenly the doors opened and a haggard-looking Gaius was dragged in next to Merlin and brought to his knees. He was in front of Merlin, though the warlock could still see his face from where he stood.Gaius started chanting, his eyes glowing, Merlin felt sharp pain from where Gaius’ fingers met his skin; he cried out.Uther had to put an arm out to keep Arthur in place as light erupted from where they’d been staring. Eyes were averted as the bright beam engulfed Merlin’s frame. When the light faded, Merlin hit the ground with a thud.

entry.title: A Magician and his King
entry.summary:
Author: Eliott_Marsh

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,667Chapters: 34/?Kudos: 95

Summary: He felt the hairs on the back of his neck stand-up. He wasn't alone. Before he could fully process this information, he was halfway across the room with his dagger at the throat of his manservant, who was snoring peacefully on Arthur's windowsill with a broom clutched in his elbow.He breathed in sharply, adrenaline ramping up a notch as he realized how close he had been to cutting Merlin's throat.Dropping the blade to his side, Arthur studied him. Merlin's long form collapsed in on itself to fit on the small shelf, his inky black hair curling against the morning dew that was gathering on the window panes. His thick eyelashes were fluttering lightly over his pale cheeks and one of his hands was twitching, but he slept soundly.OR: The Merthur fic you didn't know you needed.

entry.title: The Sundered Soul
entry.summary:
Author: DarkWhimsy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,349Chapters: 5/12Kudos: 181

Summary: When a sparring accident nearly kills Arthur, Merlin reacts without thinking - and exposes his magic before the entire training yard. But the fallout is interrupted by a sorcerer’s attack that rips Merlin’s soul from his body, leaving behind only Emrys: magic incarnate, stripped of warmth and memory. As Camelot reels, Arthur must face not just the politics of magic and the prophecy surrounding him, but his own feelings for the servant who has always stood by his side. Magic has always come at a cost - but Arthur never imagined the price would be Merlin himself.

entry.summary:

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,028Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 17

Summary: AU where everyone has wings but some are not strong enough to carry them on their back, their solution? The only piece of magic that is overlooked by King Uther - Concealment Charms.Arthur Pendragon has lived under the knowledge that a witch killed his mother his entire life, the same witch who weaken him and his wings before he ever flew. Afterall, magic stole his mother, he wasn't letting it take something from him as well.

entry.title: Some and Now None of You
entry.summary:
Author: Isthisusernameavailableornot

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 106,224Chapters: 35/47Kudos: 857

Summary: "Let him think I hate him. If that’ll stop him from risking his neck for me over and over again, then it’s a sacrifice I don’t have to think twice about." — Arthur finds out Merlin has magic. He also finds out how often Merlin risked his life for him and so, he does the only thing he can think of to protect him: banishment. Hurt and angry, Merlin leaves and swears to not look back. But, when two years pass and Morgana shows up at Merlin’s door, urging him to fill Gaius’ position as Court Physician, Merlin agrees. He really doesn’t know why, but Arthur is sure Merlin would do just about anything to get on his nerves. Unprepared for the shock of seeing Merlin back in the castle, Arthur is forced to speed along his plans to lift the ban on magic. But between stubborn councilors, a mysterious plague, a still angry Merlin, and Morgana being Morgana, Arthur is fairly certain he’ll lose his mind before the first year of his reign even ends.

entry.title: from the start
entry.summary:
Author: hansuckss

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,619Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 13

Summary: Ever since Merlin stood in front of that window for the very first time, curious eyes were fixed on the boy that played between the flowers right in front his new house. They were fixed on him then, from that moment, and on. Or; Merlin is back at his mother’s house for a wedding, and despite his attempts to move on, seeing his childhood best friend, Arthur, it forces him to revisit feelings that he has been trying to leave behind.

entry.title: death wish
entry.summary:
Author: mysterytwin

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,843Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 41

Summary: “Don’t get me wrong,” Merlin says, still just as quiet, his chin tucked into Arthur’s shoulder. “Of course you want to leave. There’s no reason to stay in the Underworld.” Suddenly, Arthur is grateful that his face is hidden from Merlin’s view. Perhaps it’s for this reason that he finds himself saying, “Yes, there is. There’s one.” In which Arthur is on a quest to escape the Underworld to find his mother when he meets Merlin, a peculiar but intriguing shade, along the way.
